name: RUN (itch) (Tommy Lau)
description:
This is a game about a Ball.

A ball that triggered a relic in a Mysterical Pavilion, being chased by a Storm because of that.

Then the player needs to clear 19 Levels to Clear the Storm.

Or just play a few levels to have a sad ending.

This game is narrated by me XD.

and the project is completed within a week.

I hope to find other Developers to make games together!
